snippet: After childhood false starts, adolescent indifference and a lengthy effort to conceal the deficiency as an adult, the time had come for a transportation reporter to learn how to ride a bike.
abstract: Matt Flegenheimer, transportation reporter, decides the time has come to learn how to ride a bicycle;' says, with increased ridership and new bike share programs, he needs to understand what has become perhaps the city's most polarizing transportation topic.
lead_paragraph: After childhood false starts, adolescent indifference and a lengthy effort to conceal the deficiency as an adult, the time had come for a transportation reporter to learn how to ride a bike.

headline.seo: A Reporter Learns to Ride a Bicycle as an Adult
headline.main: As Easy as ... Look Ahead! Turn! Oh, No!
headline.print_headline: As Easy as ... Look Ahead! Turn! Oh, No!
